introduction: SYNOPSISModels Sung-hoon and Dong-jin are inseparable. Coincidentally, Sung-hoon, being a face model, and Dong-jin, being the body model who stands in for Sung-hoon, is not the main reason why. They do everything together. In regard to women, they are pick-up artists. To them, women are disposable, not objects of affection and true feelings. Aerobics instructor Jin-ah and fashion model Da-hye are roommates. Da-hye will do anything to succeed, while Jin-ah has a different set of values. One day, Sung-hoon and Jin-ah meet during a photo shoot for exercise wear and enjoy a night together. But their feelings begin to grow for one another. But Sung-hoon, in the name of success, betrays Jin-ah by sleeping with wealthy older women. When Jin-ah finds out the truth, she leaves Sung-hoon.故事森·胡模型和东津是分不开的ttelreya之间。森·胡将面临模型，向东不只是身体，其次是带带模型，该奖项的身体，他们的一切。特别是妇女打猎... ... 。对他们来说，一个女人不只是一个赌注仅有夜间的相对愿望。该名称可以爱，不知道，每天以满足新的欲望是他们最关心的问题。他们的女人，狩猎条女人不爱只是一次性的。同时，健美操指导员，金妮和时装模特dahye一起生活。男性甚至享受留宿是他们同居不应该的规则，第一条。Dahye是具有挑战性的妇女不要捏任何东西，为了作为一种模式的成功。但获胜，但开放有一个女人谁仍然相信爱情遗体的清白。
